traits.name: Arcane Recovery (1/Day)
traits.desc: When the crusader finishes a short rest, it can regain up to 4 total expended spell slots.

traits.name: Burning Strike
traits.desc: When the crusader hits with a melee weapon attack, it can expend a spell slot to deal an addition 9 (2d8) fire damage, in addition to the weapon's damage. This damage increases by 1d8 fire damage per spell slot level above 1st.

traits.name: Combat Caster
traits.desc: The crusader can perform the somatic components of spells even when it has weapons or a shield in one or both hands.

traits.name: Endless Assault
traits.desc: When the crusader takes the attack action, it can expend a spell slot up to level 2 to gain additional attacks this turn. If a level 1 slot is expended, the crusader gains one additional attack. If the level 2 spell slot is expended, the crusader gains 2 additional attacks.

traits.name: Transmutation Mastery
traits.desc: The crusader has a deep knowledge of transmutation magics and can use that to adapt its fighting style to the needs at hand. As a bonus action, the crusader can transform its weapon into a pike, a greatsword, or back to a maul.

traits.name: Spellcasting
traits.desc: The crusader is a 9th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is intelligence (spell save DC 16, +8 to hit with spell attacks). The crusader has the following wizard and paladin spells prepared: * Cantrips (at will): dancing lights, fire bolt * 1st level (4 slots): burning hands, searing smite, thunderous smite * 2nd level (3 slots): flaming sphere, magic weapon * 3rd level (3 slots): fireball, phantom steed * 4th level (2 slots): fire shield, wall of fire

actions.name: Multiattack
actions.desc: The crusader makes two melee attacks.

actions.name: Maul
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) bludgeoning damage.

actions.name: Pike
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. Hit: 8 (1d10 + 3) piercing damage.

actions.name: Greatsword
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +7 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 10 (2d6 + 3) slashing damage.
